data.name: CreateJobRun
CreateKsDeptMotorVeh
CreateReportData
ReadAdministrativeAction
data.value: select top(1) TYPE from CKT_ADMIN_ACTION with(readuncommitted) where TYPE = @type

data.name: ReadCaseCaseUnitCaseRole1
data.value: select distinct T1.NUMB, T1.STATUS, T2.CU_NUMBER, T2.CSP_NO_AP, T3.CSP_NUMBER, T3.TYPE, T3.CASE_ROLE_ID, T3.START_DATE, T3.END_DATE from CKT_CASE T1 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_CASE_ROLE T3 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_LEG_ACT_CAS_RL T4 with(readuncommitted) on (@cspNumber = T3.CSP_NUMBER) and (T3.START_DATE <= @startDate) and (T3.END_DATE >= @startDate) and (T3.TYPE = 'AP') and (T3.CASE_ROLE_ID = T4.CRO_IDENTIFIER) and (T3.TYPE = T4.CRO_TYPE) and (T3.CSP_NUMBER = T4.CSP_NUMBER) and (T3.CAS_NUMBER = T4.CAS_NUMBER) and (@lgaId = T4.LGA_ID) on (T1.NUMB = T3.CAS_NUMBER) and (T1.STATUS = 'O') join CKT_CASE_UNIT T2 with(readuncommitted) on (@cspNumber = T2.CSP_NO_AP) and (T1.NUMB = T2.CAS_NO)

data.name: ReadCaseCaseUnitCaseRole2
data.value: select distinct T1.NUMB, T1.STATUS, T2.CU_NUMBER, T2.CSP_NO_AP, T3.CSP_NUMBER, T3.TYPE, T3.CASE_ROLE_ID, T3.START_DATE, T3.END_DATE from CKT_CASE T1 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_CASE_ROLE T3 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_LEG_ACT_CAS_RL T4 with(readuncommitted) on (@cspNumber = T3.CSP_NUMBER) and (T3.TYPE = 'AP') and (T3.CASE_ROLE_ID = T4.CRO_IDENTIFIER) and (T3.TYPE = T4.CRO_TYPE) and (T3.CSP_NUMBER = T4.CSP_NUMBER) and (T3.CAS_NUMBER = T4.CAS_NUMBER) and (@lgaId = T4.LGA_ID) on (T1.NUMB = T3.CAS_NUMBER) and (T1.STATUS = 'O') join CKT_CASE_UNIT T2 with(readuncommitted) on (@cspNumber = T2.CSP_NO_AP) and (T1.NUMB = T2.CAS_NO)

data.name: ReadCaseCaseUnitCaseRole3
data.value: select distinct T1.NUMB, T1.STATUS, T2.CU_NUMBER, T2.CSP_NO_AP, T3.CSP_NUMBER, T3.TYPE, T3.CASE_ROLE_ID, T3.START_DATE, T3.END_DATE from CKT_CASE T1 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_CASE_ROLE T3 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_LEG_ACT_CAS_RL T4 with(readuncommitted) on (@cspNumber = T3.CSP_NUMBER) and (T3.TYPE = 'AP') and (T3.CASE_ROLE_ID = T4.CRO_IDENTIFIER) and (T3.TYPE = T4.CRO_TYPE) and (T3.CSP_NUMBER = T4.CSP_NUMBER) and (T3.CAS_NUMBER = T4.CAS_NUMBER) and (@lgaId = T4.LGA_ID) on T1.NUMB = T3.CAS_NUMBER join CKT_CASE_UNIT T2 with(readuncommitted) on (@cspNumber = T2.CSP_NO_AP) and (T1.NUMB = T2.CAS_NO)

data.name: ReadCsePersonKsDriversLicense1
data.value: select T1.NUMB, T1.TYPE, T1.DATE_OF_DEATH, T1.FAMILY_VIOL_IND, T2.LGA_IDENTIFIER, T2.KS_DVR_LICENSE, T2.VALIDATION_DATE, T2.RESTRICTED_DATE, T2.REINSTATED_DATE, T2.MANUAL_IND, T2.MANUAL_DATE, T2.RESTRICT_SENT_DT, T2.RESTRICTION_STATUS, T2.AMOUNT_OWED, T2.REC_CLOSURE_REASON, T2.RECORD_CLOSURE_DT, T2.LAST_UPDATED_BY, T2.LAST_UPD_TSTAMP, T2.SEQUENCE_COUNTER from CKT_CSE_PERSON T1 join CKT_KDMV T2 on (T1.NUMB = @numb) and (T1.NUMB = T2.CSP_NUM) and (T2.RESTRICT_SENT_DT = @restrictSentDt) and (T2.RESTRICTED_DATE <= @restrictedDate) and (T2.MANUAL_DATE <= @restrictedDate) and (T2.REC_CLOSURE_REASON <= ' ')

data.name: ReadCsePersonKsDriversLicense2
data.value: select T1.NUMB, T1.TYPE, T1.DATE_OF_DEATH, T1.FAMILY_VIOL_IND, T2.LGA_IDENTIFIER, T2.KS_DVR_LICENSE, T2.VALIDATION_DATE, T2.RESTRICTED_DATE, T2.REINSTATED_DATE, T2.MANUAL_IND, T2.MANUAL_DATE, T2.RESTRICT_SENT_DT, T2.RESTRICTION_STATUS, T2.AMOUNT_OWED, T2.REC_CLOSURE_REASON, T2.RECORD_CLOSURE_DT, T2.LAST_UPDATED_BY, T2.LAST_UPD_TSTAMP, T2.SEQUENCE_COUNTER from CKT_CSE_PERSON T1 join CKT_KDMV T2 on (T1.NUMB = @numb) and (T1.NUMB = T2.CSP_NUM) and (T2.MANUAL_DATE = @manualDate) and (T2.REINSTATED_DATE <= @reinstatedDate)

data.name: ReadJob
data.value: select top(1) NAME from CKT_JOB where NAME = 'SRRUN148'

data.name: ReadKsDriversLicenseCsePerson1
data.value: select T1.CSP_NUM, T1.LGA_IDENTIFIER, T1.KS_DVR_LICENSE, T1.VALIDATION_DATE, T1.RESTRICTED_DATE, T1.REINSTATED_DATE, T1.MANUAL_IND, T1.MANUAL_DATE, T1.RESTRICT_SENT_DT, T1.RESTRICTION_STATUS, T1.AMOUNT_OWED, T1.REC_CLOSURE_REASON, T1.RECORD_CLOSURE_DT, T1.LAST_UPDATED_BY, T1.LAST_UPD_TSTAMP, T1.SEQUENCE_COUNTER, T2.TYPE, T2.DATE_OF_DEATH, T2.FAMILY_VIOL_IND from CKT_CSE_PERSON T2 join CKT_KDMV T1 on (T1.RESTRICT_SENT_DT = @restrictSentDt) and (T2.NUMB = T1.CSP_NUM) and (T1.RESTRICTED_DATE <= @restrictedDate) and (T1.RECORD_CLOSURE_DT <= @restrictedDate) and (T1.REINSTATED_DATE <= @restrictedDate) order by T1.CSP_NUM

data.name: ReadKsDriversLicenseCsePerson2
data.value: select T1.CSP_NUM, T1.LGA_IDENTIFIER, T1.KS_DVR_LICENSE, T1.VALIDATION_DATE, T1.RESTRICTED_DATE, T1.REINSTATED_DATE, T1.MANUAL_IND, T1.MANUAL_DATE, T1.RESTRICT_SENT_DT, T1.RESTRICTION_STATUS, T1.AMOUNT_OWED, T1.REC_CLOSURE_REASON, T1.RECORD_CLOSURE_DT, T1.LAST_UPDATED_BY, T1.LAST_UPD_TSTAMP, T1.SEQUENCE_COUNTER, T2.TYPE, T2.DATE_OF_DEATH, T2.FAMILY_VIOL_IND from CKT_CSE_PERSON T2 join CKT_KDMV T1 on (T1.MANUAL_DATE = @manualDate) and (T2.NUMB = T1.CSP_NUM) and (T1.RECORD_CLOSURE_DT <= @recordClosureDt) and (T1.REINSTATED_DATE <= @recordClosureDt) order by T1.CSP_NUM

data.name: ReadLegalAction
data.value: select top(1) LEGAL_ACTION_ID, FILED_DT, COURT_CASE_NO, END_DT, STANDARD_NO from CKT_LEGAL_ACTION where LEGAL_ACTION_ID = @legalActionId

data.name: ReadObligor
data.value: select top(1) CSP_NUMBER, TYPE from CKT_CSE_PERSON_ACC where CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber

data.name: UpdateKsDriversLicense1
data.value: update CKT_KDMV set REINSTATED_DATE = @reinstatedDate, RESTRICTION_STATUS = @restrictionStatus, LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, LAST_UPD_TSTAMP = @lastUpdTstamp where (CSP_NUM = @cspNum) and (SEQUENCE_COUNTER = @sequenceCounter)

data.name: UpdateKsDriversLicense2
data.value: update CKT_KDMV set RESTRICTED_DATE = @restrictedDate, RESTRICTION_STATUS = @restrictionStatus, LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, LAST_UPD_TSTAMP = @lastUpdTstamp where (CSP_NUM = @cspNum) and (SEQUENCE_COUNTER = @sequenceCounter)

data.name: UpdateKsDriversLicense3
data.value: update CKT_KDMV set REINSTATED_DATE = @reinstatedDate, RESTRICTION_STATUS = @restrictionStatus, REC_CLOSURE_REASON = @recClosureReason, RECORD_CLOSURE_DT = @recordClosureDt, LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, LAST_UPD_TSTAMP = @lastUpdTstamp where (CSP_NUM = @cspNum) and (SEQUENCE_COUNTER = @sequenceCounter)

data.name: UpdateKsDriversLicense4
data.value: update CKT_KDMV set RESTRICTION_STATUS = @restrictionStatus, REC_CLOSURE_REASON = @recClosureReason, RECORD_CLOSURE_DT = @recordClosureDt, LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, LAST_UPD_TSTAMP = @lastUpdTstamp where (CSP_NUM = @cspNum) and (SEQUENCE_COUNTER = @sequenceCounter)
